programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Kenneth is all nerves over Nina's O'-level results. Over at the Hassans', Dewi comes back and her presence sends Helmi into a panicked state of confusion.

programme.title: FBI S2
programme.desc: Season 2 of the FBI drama series about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI. The FBI team investigates a drug deal gone bad after the body of a college student is found. Also, Detective Hailey Upton temporarily joins the team and finds her usual investigative methods clash with the Bureau's more buttoned-up environment.

programme.title: The Noise S1
programme.desc: To succeed in THE NOISE, teams of contestants must complete seemingly easy challenges without making a single sound. Can they pedal a bicycle or unzip a sports bag or open a can of coke while staying completely quiet?

programme.title: The Strangest Weather On Earth S3
programme.desc: Season 3 of the series explores the the wild and wonderful world of the weirdest weather on earth with each episode featuring spectacular visuals, fascinating demonstrations and explanations as to what causes all of these strange occurrences.

programme.title: Mata Mata S2
programme.desc: Dr Peter Beh and Margaret build up a rapport that unsettles her childhood crush, Alan. Cabaret girl Helen is faced with a difficult choice between marriage and vengeance. Three bank robbers execute a daring bank heist in broad daylight and spark off an island-wide manhunt.

programme.title: Arts 21
programme.desc: ARTS 21 is an arts magazine show focusing on the latest news and events on the culture scene.

programme.title: Island Feast With Peter Kuruvita S2
programme.desc: After 10 weeks of remarkable island exploration, chef Peter Kuruvita concludes his journey in the stunning paradise of the Cook Islands. In this final episode Peter snorkels and spearfishes the pristine waters of Aitutaki, hunts and cooks mud crabs, and finally prepares an old favourite beer battered fish recipe on the island of Atiu, a recipe Peter guarantees will be the best beer batter you've ever had.

programme.title: Jamie's Quick and Easy Food S2
programme.desc: The nation's favourite chef is back, with his simplest, easiest recipes yet for food that still packs a serious flavour punch. When life is getting on top of you, you need quick and easy recipes that do the job with no fuss, and in this series, Jamie's got fantastic dishes using just five ingredients plus brilliant tips on the techniques that'll save you time and improve your cooking, even on your busiest days.

programme.title: Beat Shazam S3
programme.desc: Beat Shazam is an interactive musical game show based on the Shazam app, in which teams compete against each other attempting to identify songs.

programme.title: 44 Cats - First Series
programme.desc: Meatball is the clumsiest of the Buffycats, perfect target for the tricks of Blister and Scab, Boss's helpers. To help him defend himself and gain self-confidence, Milady takes Meatball to Cato, her Master, who can teach him the secrets of Cat-fu. Will Meatball find the courage to face them?!

programme.title: 44 Cats - First Series
programme.desc: What's better than a circus and a clown cat performing unbelievable tricks like magically appearing and disappearing? The Buffycats are totally charmed by his skills, while Boss, Blister and Scab try to attract him in their team to trick the cats of the neighborhood...

programme.title: Pokemon the Series: Sun & Moon - Ultra Legends S22
programme.desc: This season follows the final adventures of Ash Ketchum and his classmates at the Pokemon school in the Alola region.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S5
programme.desc: A monster truck and his human driver go on adventures together while learning about science, technology, engineering and math.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2
programme.desc: Travelling the world with their teacher, mentor and friend Ubercorn, a disco-grooving unicorn, the Go Jetters are fixing the mishaps caused by the mischievous meddlings of Grandmaster Glitch in new locations including Central Park in New York, Machu Picchu, China, Japan, Mali, and Petra in Jordan. And now we get to know our plucky international heroes, Xuli, Kyan, Lars and Foz even better, as Series 2 takes us to the top-secret island home of the Go Jet Academy to see them intraining.

programme.title: Counting With Paula S5
programme.desc: Mr. Banana Tree is feeling lonely. He's always stuck in the ground and unable to go places. Paula and her friends come up with a plan to cure Mr. Banana Tree's loneliness. Will they succeed? Tim is convinced he's a great handyman. His abilities are put the test when he's called upon to cover for Mr. Mechanic who is away on vacation. Will Tim live up to his self proclaimed name, "Mr. Quick Fix?".

programme.title: Pororo the Little Penguin S7
programme.desc: Pororo is a Little Penguin with big dreams! He lives on a tiny island with his friends Eddy the Fox, Loopy the Beaver, Poby the Polar Bear, and Crong the Dinosaur to name a few and they planned for the best fun ever in this new season.

programme.title: Sesame Street S49
programme.desc: Catch a brand new segment called "Abby's Amazing Adventures". And look out for special appearances by celebrity guests like Whoopi Goldberg, Zooey Deschanel, Amanda Seyfried and Blake Lively.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S6
programme.desc: Led by a boy named Ryder, a team of six playful rescue dogs use their individual talents to protect the seaside town of Adventure Bay. The pups are occasionally joined by newer helpers: Cap'n Turbot, Robo-Dog, Everest, and Tracker.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S6
programme.desc: The red Man is letting his power go to his head. At the ollipolis car race, he tries to keep everyone safe, but his shouting and bossiness causes chaos. Can the gang show him that he doesn't have to shout to make himself heard? The aliens get a new pet, but being a pet owner is harder than they thought. They abandon their pet in the middle of the park, but when the pet starts shrinking things in town, they have to find a way to get it back and learn to be responsible pet owners.

Talking with the stall vendors, Luke uncovers the secrets of recipes passed down through families for generations.

programme.title: Future Proof
programme.desc: It's Alan's birthday. It turns out to be the worst day of his life when his girlfriend Ariel announces she's pregnant and he receives news of his estranged father Seng Lee's death - his father whom he believed died years ago. Alan inherits Seng Lee's personal effects, including a vintage date stamp, which unexpectedly transports Alan back in time to 1965, where he gets to meet his father for the first time.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted S2

programme.title: Heroes & Survivors : Defying Death S2
programme.desc: In these desperate situations, the heroic hand of a stranger may be the difference between life and death for someone. All of these stories of bravery, defiance and heroic acts come from people confronted with extreme and death-defying situations around the globe. programme.title: 食分绝配
programme.desc: 矿石、海藻、盐水、浮游物等特殊的海底形态交织出多变的鲜味物质，丰富了各类海洋生物胺基酸含量，成了一吃难忘的海鲜味。矜贵的海产往往只需极简的烹饪手法与特定的食材搭配，就能勾勒出鲜味的极致；杨应晖这次分身不暇，忙着为不同海域的特级海产如帝王蟹、深海石斑、牡丹虾等，找出食分绝配的食材，呈现满分美味的料理！.

programme.desc: 宁毅、刘西瓜、陈凡巡街，发现粮价极高，意识到是鲍文翰故意抬高粮价。刘西瓜找方天雷评理，却被驳回。刘西瓜觉得自己不能放任不管。入夜后带领霸刀营的人攻入宣威营，结果被早有准备的鲍文翰打回。趁着霸刀营出门，宁毅借用军师的身份，偷偷解救了被关在大牢的赘婿四人，结果被刚回来的霸刀营贼寇发现，只好先自保。赘婿四人因此误会宁毅投靠了贼寇。宁毅告诉刘西瓜自己有办法筹粮，但谢绝了刘西瓜备好的身强力壮的贼寇们，而是拉来了一众老弱病残，并借此机会救出四位赘婿组团出城，打算一起逃跑。宁毅与四位赘婿带领众人去城外筹粮，陈凡执意跟随.

programme.title: 离地自由行 –非洲

programme.title: 离地自由行 –非洲
programme.desc: (PG) 袁学谦(Benedict)进行28日的东非之旅，由坦桑尼亚出发，寻找电影《铁达尼号》中的坦桑石「海洋之心」；以Glamping方式，近距离与万兽之王共处一室；以开篷四驱车、热气球、步行探险多种玩法，穿梭野生动物保护区；当然少不了以航拍角度，离地俯瞰壮观的非洲大地。他一路向南，走进彩虹之国南非，前往被喻为世界最危险城市之一的约翰内斯堡，探索非洲白人的奢华，以及奴隶主义之后，非洲黑人的压抑生活；并在南非行政首都Pretoria，以全世界其中一种最贵的火车游方式，直奔度假胜地开普敦，欣赏世界自然奇观，.
